thread.section_title: serverloft.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of serverloft.com | serverloft.com
thread.title: Nikolay Mihaylov

author: Nikolay Mihaylov
title: Nikolay Mihaylov
text:
Server Loft offers wide range dedicated servers. From small dual core AMD servers to big HP servers with two 6 cores E5 XEON CPU's.
You also can configure the server yourself and have fully customized server. I need to point, in this case, the price is bit higher than similar pre-configured server.
Every server can be with SATA disk or SSD, so you can choose between blazing speed or lots of storage - tried both and currently have server with 2 TB SSD space and another with 12 TB space.
You can also choose between several Linux distributions. I personally use CentOS 7. They also include old Linux versions such CentOS 5 or CentOS 6 if you are stuck with it for some reason. Ms Windows is also supported.
Even you choose custom configured server, usually it is available in 2-3 hours.
Servers can be in USA or Germany. Both networks are fast and reliable. For most servers, you can get up to 4 IP addresses, but for some servers you can get more. This is something you need to check before order.
Technical support is OK. I used it several times and response is promptly.
